titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5710) to establish the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-773, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5710 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 233.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in House

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 600.
DEBATE - The House continued with debate on H. Res. 600.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment and on the resolution without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 177 (Roll no. 475).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/13/2002--Passed House without amendment. Provides for consideration of H.R. 5710 (establishment of the Department of Homeland Security).
